state: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First thing I need you to do is to try to head north. Then, try to venture west. And then, attempt to move south. Then, go west. And then, travel west. After that, attempt to move north. Then, attempt to travel west. After that, attempt to travel west. With that accomplished, attempt to move south. Next, move south. After that, go to the south. Then, make an effort to travel west. With that done, take a trip west. Okay, and then, venture north. Then, pick-up the coin from the floor of the bedchamber. And if you do that, you're the winner! -= Restroom =- You arrive in a restroom. An usual one. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. > -= Restroom =-0/1
